thread.title: EQUINIX INC Files SEC form 8-K, Regulation FD Disclosure, Financial Statements and Exhibits
thread.title_full: EQUINIX INC Files SEC form 8-K, Regulation FD Disclosure, Financial Statements and Exhibits

title: EQUINIX INC Files SEC form 8-K, Regulation FD Disclosure, Financial Statements and Exhibits
text:
Show all filings for EQUINIX INC 
Form 8-K for EQUINIX INC 
23-Oct-2015 
Regulation FD Disclosure, Financial Statements and Exhibits Item 7.01 Regulation FD Disclosure. 
On May 29, 2015, Equinix, Inc. ("Equinix") announced a cash and share offer for the entire issued and to be issued share capital of Telecity Group plc (the "Transaction"). 
On October 23, 2015, Equinix issued an announcement regarding the process for regulatory approval of the Transaction from the European Commission (the "Announcement"). A copy of the Announcement is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1. The attached exhibit is provided under this Item 7.01 of Form 8-K to broadly disseminate the information and is furnished to, but not filed with, the Securities and Exchange Commission. Item 9.01. Financial Statements and Exhibits 
(d) Exhibits.
